title: VCR OSD font?
content:
Hi everyone,

I am looking for a specific font, used in old VCR OSD menus. Does anyone know what's this font called?

Thanks.

[http://www.typophile.com/files/vcr\_5116.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012191917/http:/www.typophile.com/files/vcr_5116.png "http://www.typophile.com/files/vcr\_5116.png")

[http://4.bp.blogspot.com/\_HPo7WWrtVWA/RktHrP6mESI/AAAAAAAAAA8/DGuhVEhVN2...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012191917/http:/4.bp.blogspot.com/_HPo7WWrtVWA/RktHrP6mESI/AAAAAAAAAA8/DGuhVEhVN2A/s320/Menu+normal+audio.jpg "http://4.bp.blogspot.com/\_HPo7WWrtVWA/RktHrP6mESI/AAAAAAAAAA8/DGuhVEhVN2A/s320/Menu+normal+audio.jpg")
author: xtrapurified

comments.content:
on mac osx try: Synchro LET
